phrases: Episode 10 Umaru and Now and Once Upon a Time
I keep telling her she needs to sleep in her bed,
but she fell asleep playing a game again.
I actually do not feel that bad.
I will just have Onii-chan dote on me for a while, and laze around.
Well, I am heading to the office.
You are not taking the day off?
Onii-chan, you are actually going to leave your sick sister home alone, and go to work?
No one stays home from work because their little sister has a cold.
Not to mention, this time, you got what you deserved.
This happened because you fell asleep playing a game and left the AC on.
I will be home early, so stay in bed and think about what you have done.
I will just make myself sicker, and make you worry more.
Of course, my virus is totally lazy.
What do you guys want to do?
Let us not bother this time.
The morning after you get over a cold feels so good!
I will do some radio calisthenics that I vaguely remember!
You totally caught a cold, Onii-chan!
The sound is rattling my brain.
Thank you for everything you do.
You see, my brother has a fever.
Well, you have a cold, so you need to rest.
You are going to start weird rumors again.
I will talk to them myself.
Lucky for you, I have today off, since it is my school's anniversary.
I will take good care of you.
Well, I am going to go shopping.
Make sure you stay in bed, Onii-chan.
I will take very good care of you.
And I will do that using...
You will pay deeply for leaving me home with a cold alone.
I hear it is good to sweat when you have a cold,
so first, I will give Onii-chan a spicy soup filled with plenty of Tabasco.
I have heard that green onions work well when stabbed up the butt.
I will do that for Onii-chan, too.
Because I gave it to him...
Get a fever, get a fever, get a fever, fever, fever.
Suffer and writhe, Onii-chan, one, two!
Get a fever, get a fever, get a fever, fever, fever.
I am going to protect Onii-chan!
L-Let us all defeat her together!
You are not taking the day off?
Thanks for taking care of me.
You reek of green onions, Onii-chan.
But it seems like this took care of the cold.
Wait, what is with this dinner?
That is pretty rude, after I made this for you.
You should not expect to get what you want to eat every time.
Why have not you touched your green peppers?
so I chop them up finely, change the seasoning...
I put a lot of work into making it for you.
Well, that seems like a lot of trouble, so you do not have to make it anymore.
At least eat your green peppers.
I do not care if you make those dramatic reactions, as long as you eat them.
Onii-chan, you did not put green peppers in my lunch, did you?
You always bring a lunch, Ebina-chan.
It is so hard to make them in the morning...
Oh, but I guess it is the same for you, Umaru-chan.
Oh, well, in my case, Onii-chan...
Do not be a picky eater.
Onii-chan's such a picky eater, it is difficult to make his lunches.
You make your brother's lunches, too?
It is not a big deal.
It is hard enough for me just to make my own.
Making two really is not that much more work than making one.
Lunch break's almost over, so let us hurry and eat.
There are green peppers in it!
Ah, Hamburg steak with green peppers.
Hamburg steak with green peppers is a lot of work to do in the morning.
so I chop them up finely, change the seasoning...
I put a lot of work into making it for you.
I am sure Onii-san is very happy
that you add them in a way that he can eat them.
You really need to stop that!
What are you going to do if my glasses break?
There were green peppers in my lunch today.
I guess even Hamburg steak did not work.
It was a lot of work to make that.
So from now on, just green pepper stir-fry is fine.
I never get tired of his face or his moves.
But the Internet is really amazing, since it let us me watch
all this amusing stuff for free.
I am connected to the world right now!
It got under the desk, too.
What is it doing under the desk?
It is got a lot of glowing lights...
Unable to connect to the Internet
That contraption was for connecting to the Internet!
Wh-Wh-What am I going to do?!
I will look it up on Yapoo Answers!
Unable to connect to the Internet
I cannot connect to the Internet, so I cannot look it up!
MogPad is not connected to the Internet.
Without the Internet, I cannot connect to the world.
I never thought something this awful would happen.
I will just play a game to calm my nerves.
Unable to connect to the Internet
I have been isolated from the world!
Unable to connect to the Internet
Since it got wet, it is too dangerous to turn on the power,
so it will have to be fixed.
You have got such a nice face, and that totally kills it!
What happens with a joker revolution, Tanukichi?
We do not have a rule like that where I am from!
By the way, is Tanukichi supposed to be me?
That hood is a tanuki, right?
Please help us achieve 0 drink waste CONBU
My first time at a manga cafe!
Since our Internet is out, I threw a tantrum, and Onii-chan gave me money.
Then go to a manga cafe or something.
Basic Charges Entrance Fee: 300 yen First 30 Minutes: 200 yen Additional 10 Minute Increments: 80 yen 3 Hour Pack: 680 yen 5 Hour Pack: 1000 yen 7 Hour Pack: 1400 yen Long Night Pack: 1580 yen
How long would you like to stay?
I ended up renting this space for seven hours.
I guess it is not just this one.
All of the rooms are small.
But because it is so tiny...
It feels like I have got my own secret base!
And I can use the Internet all I want!
I can read all the manga I want!
I can drink all the drinks I want!
It is not every day you find such a comfortable base.
I am going to conquer at least three long-running manga titles today.
And since it is a private room,
I can look like this, even though I am out of the house!
This always relaxes me the most.
Off On Body Fingers NeckShoulders Clapping Back Rolling Speed HighLow Knead 10 Min 30 Min 60 Min Repeat Random Special
Who knew they would have a massage chair, too?!
This is better than my house!
I still have six hours left, so I need to have even more fun than I usually do.
Miss, you still have more than four hours remaining.
He is just like a computer.
His head's as pointy as ever, though.
There is some trick or something, right, Taihei?
You knew the test questions early, or something.
The math was actually really easy this time.
I studied, and all I got was a 15!
Which means a score of 15 is apparently your limit.
H-How dare you say that, woman?!
Since the test is over, why do not we go out somewhere?
Then let us go to the arcade that opened up by the station.
I will show you my awesome crane game techniques.
You need to go home and study so you can shoot for a 20.
I could get a 30 if I tried!
Taihei, let us leave this idiot and go.
Our friendship is real, is not it?!
I have never been to an arcade before.
What a shallow attempt to get people to play.
For plushies like this, you aim for the neck.
Make your winning pose after you win something.
Dolls have a heavy head, which puts their center of balance higher.
In other words, if you go for the neck,
it will be stable, and you can lift it up.
What the hell's with this crane?!
You do not lift things up in this.
After watching Bomber play just now,
I saw that there was no limit to the arm's descent.
Which means you use the arm to push a plushie that is near the hole down.
I pushed it, but it did not move at all!
What the hell was that for, you violent woman?!
Do you know what decade this is, you idiot?!
That is a hairstyle from half a century ago!
Why cannot you see the awesomeness of this hair?!
Like I would want to know!
In a time where people lack originality, my hair shines gloriously...
Now that I look, the plushies' legs are tangled together.
No wonder it did not move!
Yeah, there is no way we could get these.
What if we aimed for the tag on this plushie?
You would be wasting a hundred yen, Taihei.
There are three, so let us divide them between us.
Have you been a good girl?
Oh, I got something cool for you, Umaru.
I got even more plushies at the arcade!
People mistakenly call me Kanou, but I am Kanau.
Someone I have not met in the anime came to the preview again.
I am not even sure when we will meet in the original story, either.
This is awkward in so many ways...
